sentences.english: Chum Kiu is a middle rank routine of Wing Chun.
sentences.chinese: 寻桥是咏春拳的中级套路。

sentences.english: In Wing Chun there is a set form for mook jong training.
sentences.chinese: 在咏春拳里有一套完整的木人桩训练体系。

sentences.english: I am at present mainly teaching Wing Chun to students in several schools and organizations in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 现时我主要在香港的几间学校及机构教授咏春拳。

sentences.english: Bruce was trained in the classical Wing Chun style.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯是受过训练的在古典咏春拳的作风。

definition: Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Pak Mei or Bak Mei - "White Eyebrow" (Chinese Martial Art)
Baihequan (Fujian White Crane) martial art form
Cai Li Fo, Choy Li Fut, Choy Lay Fut, Choi Lei Fut, Choy Lai Fut, Choy Ley Fut, Choi Lei Faht, Tsai Li Fo, Choi Leih Faht - Martial Art
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
